name: First Do No Harm
description:
This NFT is inspired by the Hippocratic Oath, an oath of ethics historically taken by physicians. It is one of the most widely known of Greek medical texts.

The world is under siege. In a three day Global Covid Summit to speak “truth to power about Covid pandemic research and treatment.” in Rome Sept 2021, more than 3000 physicians and doctors came together and signed a document that states that “one size fits all” treatment recommendations have resulted in needless illness and death.

This NFT is inspired by that and we hope that all physicians and doctors can be reminded of their sacred duty to preserve and protect lives and to put their patients first above all.
